page.title: 02ATTITUDES-PORTPATRICK
page.content: Topics most mentioned in survey are:-{ {There being no doctor or district {nurse resident,emergency medical {treatment takes time.The nearest {medical centre is in Stranraer,eight {miles away and major hospital cases {are taken to Dumfries,90 miles distant The bus service is poor. {About one-third of houses in the old {village are let or have been sold as {holiday homes.If trend continues {Portpatrick may become a ghost village {in winter.} Grass verges and hedgerows in and around village have been neglected by council,giving an unkempt and uncared for atmosphere.{ {Dogs foul footpaths.Many tourists {bring dogs which aggravate situation.} Late licensing hours often to 0100 make for noisy streets in the early hours.
